object_name.value: Validate product does not have locked Clinical Trials associated with it

title.value: Prevents a product code from being changed if it has clinical trials that have been locked.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
The product code '$value(product_code)' cannot be changed because this product has clinical trials associated with it that are locked.
cd_clinical_trial_info where product_code = '$value(product_code)' and r_lock_owner != ' ' and r_lock_machine = ' '
